item.title: Try Static Site Generation with Hugo
item.description: If you’re into coding or general web development, you will have probably thought about creating your own site from scratch at one point or another. If you’ve trying to decide which CMS system to use, hosting provider to trust and plugins to use, take a step back for a minute. What if I told you that you could have a site with no database requirements, high performance on even free hosting and that was easy to maintain?
